content: a sweet little catnip watermelon that your feline friends will go crazy for it only uses a few simple stitches so it s a great project for beginners gauge is not important you can make this in any weight yarn just ensure your hook is two sizes smaller than the suggested size for example if working with dk use a 3mm hook instead of a 4mm hook please note using a different weight yarn than what is recommended will equal a larger or smaller finished item based on the weight chosen
